traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Seth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Invisible in Water
entries: Seth has the {@condition invisible} condition while fully immersed in water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Seth makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d6 + 7 damage) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Riptide Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Seth exhales a torrent of frigid water in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8 damage) cold damage and has the {@condition incapacitated} condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.
